author: Rappler.com
title: WATCH: 'Stranger Things' season 2 trailer
text:
WATCH: 'Stranger Things' season 2 trailer A release date for the highly anticipated upcoming season is revealed! Published 10:47 AM, February 06, 2017 Updated 10:50 AM, February 06, 2017 'STRANGER THINGS.' A new trailer for season 2 drops at the Super Bowl. Screengrab from YouTube/Netflix US & Canada 
MANILA, Philippines - A creepy new trailer for the second season of Stranger Things is out! 
There isn't any dialogue in the 30-second ad, which dropped during the Super Bowl on Sunday, February 5 (Monday, February 6 in Manila), but it gives fans just enough of a peek at what's to come. 
The trailer starts out with an old Eggo commercial – a tribute to Eleven's favorite food – but cuts to scenes of Will, Dustin, Lucas, Mike, and their town. 
"The world is turning upside down," flashes on the screen amid the scenes, along with an air date: Halloween 2017. 
Stranger Things , created by The Duffer Brothers, stars Winona Ryder, Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Gaten Matarazzo, and Noah Schnapp. – Rappler.com HOW DOES THIS STORY MAKE YOU FEEL? Happy
